documentation.title: SlideMenuChild Class [Javascript]
documentation.metadescription: KoolSlideMenu is very Easy-to-Use PHP Slide Menu. Based on Semantic rendering, Advanced CSS together with natural Sliding effect, KoolSlideMenu is Super Fast in rendering, Highly Appearance-Customizable and Elegant Behaviors, all making it stand out to be Excellent Choice for your Site Navigation

method.name: select
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testSlideMenu()
    {
        // Select the child with id="child"
        ksm.getItem("child").select();
    }
</script>

method.name: getSlideMenu
method.shortdesc: Get object of slidemenu which the child belongs to
method.longdesc: Get object of slidemenu which the child belongs to
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testSlideMenu()
    {
        // Get slidemenu object of a child with id="child", then collapse all the slidemenu
        var _child = new SlideMenuChild("child");
        _child.getSlideMenu().collapseAll();
    }
</script>
